column4: Hi, I am running Ubuntu 7.10. I am running advanced desktop effects, I am wondering if there is a way to have icons on one desktop and not on another? I currently have four desktops. An answer would be greatly appreciated : )
I believe all of the desktops remain the same
hmm, thanks for the answer even though it isn't the one I am looking for
You can ask in #compiz-fusion I don't think the answer is going to change though
